metadata.title: Unaffected components for: CVE-2017-9225 oniguruma: Out-of-bounds stack write in onigenc_unicode_get_case_fold_codes_by_str() during regular expression compilation (moderate)
metadata.description: Red Hat's versions of the associated software have been determined to NOT be affected by CVE-2017-9225.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
